video.title: The Birthday Boys
video.synopsis: Basing their show on the premise that life is absurd everywhere and always, the Birthday Boys comedy troupe brings its manic style to television.

episodes.synopsis: The guys interrogate potential imposters transporting a dangerous warhead that leaves them exposed.
episodes.title: Paychecks!

episodes.synopsis: A team of goofy construction workers get their own sitcom. A rowdy fraternity riles up Dean Strickler, a dean in name only.
episodes.title: Goofy Roofers

episodes.synopsis: A man loses his mind trying to keep up with complicated story lines in the current age of TV.
episodes.title: Catching Up on Shows

episodes.synopsis: The Birthday Boys throw one of the wildest bachelor parties of all time.
episodes.title: Rock and Roll

episodes.synopsis: The world of underground Amish juicing is exposed.
episodes.title: Cool Machine

episodes.synopsis: This instructional video series will have you golfing, fishing, birdwatching and roller skating with ease.
episodes.title: Helpful Tips

episodes.synopsis: We meet the man who discovered flight before the Wright Brothers -- only to be disavowed because his flying machine didn’t look the part.
episodes.title: Skewered!

episodes.synopsis: The guys are booked for a comedy event proclaiming that "All Your Favorites Are Back!" but they're left in green room limbo.
episodes.title: All Your Favorites Are Back

episodes.synopsis: A group of friends reminisce about their high school days with an ill-timed pact to lose their virginity before they graduate.
episodes.title: Going All the Way

episodes.synopsis: We meet Glanard Frugner, the worst animator of all time, and are introduced to some of his less than legendary creations.
episodes.title: Dumb Public

episodes.synopsis: Get class conscious as the boys skewer a Ralph Lauren-esque fashion designer, a man raised in the woods and a desperate indie rock band seeking fame.
episodes.title: Snobs and Slobs

episodes.synopsis: Explore the American Dream with a Polish immigrant father counseling his seven DJ sons and two time travelers on a rocky road to assassinate Hitler.
episodes.title: Wet Dreams May Come

episodes.synopsis: A group of female comics teach the boys that women are just as funny as men, but the cost of the lesson may be more than the fellas want to pay.
episodes.title: Women Are Funny

episodes.synopsis: The Birthday Boys go crazy for a fast food chain's social marketing campaign and meet the jaded star of the reboot of a beloved movie franchise.
episodes.title: Freshy's

episodes.synopsis: It's all about love as the boys explore romance through the eyes of a group of swinging guys and a married couple who haven't been out in ages.
episodes.title: Love Date Hump

episodes.synopsis: In the boys' definitive take on religion, they encounter students at a rowdy seminary school, a possessed man and a bombastic preacher on a crusade.
episodes.title: Getting Preachy

episodes.synopsis: The boys take melodramatic aim at unemployment and economic depression as two owners of a lumber mill desperately try to save their failing business.
episodes.title: Plight of the Working Class

episodes.synopsis: The boys have the U.S. healthcare system on their minds – or in their guts – as they remind viewers of the importance of rectal and colon health.
episodes.title: The U.S. Healthcare System

episodes.synopsis: In a scathing look at the Internet, the boys declare the World Wide Web a failure, and an idiotic man loses sleep over the online opinions of his pals.
episodes.title: Cerf's Folly

episodes.synopsis: The boys take a nostalgic look at the greatest summer of their lives and reminisce about basketball, a secret garden and Wayne the Skeleton King.
episodes.title: Season Finale
